cab.content: CABINETAMENDMENT OF CANADIAN constitution memorandum by the Secretary of State for Commonwealth relations attach a copy of an Address to the Queen from the Senate and House ofCommons of Canada, praying that legislation may be laid before the UnitedKingdom Parliament to enable Canada to amend the Canadian Constitution on a detailed matter relating to the tenure of office of certain judges.2. I ask the Cabinet to approve the introduction of the necessary Bill, whichwould be uncontroversial and should not take up much time. Like the similarAct of 1949, it could be initiated in the House of Lords.ID. S.Commonwealth Relations Office, S.W. 1,30th September, 1960.Printed for the Cabinet. October I960C.
